Tooltip_IndustricaMultiTool: Fabricates pipes and wires used to connect various ports together.
Tooltip_IndustricaItemTechTypeFilter: Filters for items using their type.
Tooltip_IndustricaCoreSampleEmpty:
A sample extracted out of the ground.
Contains no ores in any significant quantity.
Tooltip_IndustricaOreVeinResourceEmpty:
A rock that contains no ores in any significant quantity.
Nothing can be done with this, aside from trashing it out.
Tooltip_IndustricaCoreSampleTitaniumCopp:
A sample extracted out of the ground.
Contains chunks of titanium and traces of copper.
Tooltip_IndustricaOreVeinResourceTitaniu: A mix of sediment, chunks of titanium and traces of copper. Without serious processing, the copper cannot be extracted in any meaningful quantity.
